attributes.action: NOT scrap the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy out of hand, but rather to pursue energetically all realistic options for reduction of road congestion and atmospheric pollution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Differential road pricing has the potential to provide far more intelligent control of vehicle use in very congested areas – whilst avoiding penalising people in country areas which are not highly congested – than do high levels of taxation of fuel.

It will be a dereliction of duty for this generation to bequeath to the next a country clogged and unacceptably polluted by motor vehicles.

Please Mr Blair – DON’T forget about road pricing and DON’T concentrate on yet more road building.

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=road+pricing
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
